changelog:
### Iconify v7.2.0 has arrived! It has the following new changes:
## Feature Changes:
- __New Additions:__
    - Added some missing volume icons of android 15.
    - Allow hiding oneplus quick settings album art.
- __General Improvements:__
    - Fixed launcher recents blurry preview.
    - Fixed album art and compact media player for android 13.
    - Fixed lag on quick settings tile editing page.
    - Fixed navigation bar mods disabling recents gesture.
    - Fixed a few issues related to dynamic overlays.
    - Fixed dotted circle battery style.
    - Fixed toast color not following light/dark theme in android 15.
    - Fixed hotspot icon crash when swap network icon is enabled.
    - Fixed app drawer background opacity for tablet devices.
## App Changes:
- Bump AGP and dependencies
- Updated translations (thanks to all the contributors on [Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/project/iconify))
- And many more improvements...
- Clean install recommended
Also included in this version are bug fixes and other improvements.
